database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: D14_LF
entry.description: RAW files Case19T and Control19T represent D14 and Control-14 and are marked by their visit number. These are label free analyses of depleted serum samples conducted with an Orbitrap Velos- Proxeon capillary LC combination. CID fragmentation was used.
